name: interatomic

between or among atoms: interatomic distance The interatomic distance is given for one of the five contacts.interatomic forces With a number of solids the inter-atomic forces are stronger and stiffer than they are in common liquids.
More examplesFewer examplesThe increase in inter-atomic spacing explains why liquids are generally less dense than the solids from which they form.A brick wall is simply a collection of atoms bound together by inter-atomic forces.Two or three Ångström units is a fair guess for the interatomic spacing.
